entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -24.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
